org.diirt.vtype.next

Class VFloat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diirt.vtype.next.VType
      • org.diirt.vtype.next.Scalar
        • org.diirt.vtype.next.VNumber
          • org.diirt.vtype.next.VFloat

  • public abstract class VFloat
extends VNumber
    Scalar float with alarm, timestamp, display and control information. Auto-unboxing makes the extra method for the primitive type unnecessary.
    Author:
    carcassi
